param.name: file_id
param.doc: Name of the file to export.

param.name: export
param.doc: An indication that this operation is to retrieve the entire file not just a snippet. This parameter is required

method.name: GET
method.doc: To export a DynURL configuration file with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command and include the export request parameter on the DynURL Configuration File resource URI. The export parameter is what differentiates the retrieve operation and the export operation. The difference is that the export response is the text of the certificate request while the retrieve response is the certificate request text in JSON format.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Content-Type:application/octet-stream; charset=UTF-8
param.doc: The response is a stream of text.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
